mapper.select: SELECT m.members_grade , ADD_MONTHS(tr.tests_date,1)-9/24 AS UTCTestsDate, ADD_MONTHS(tr.tests_date,1) AS testsDate FROM (SELECT * FROM tests_apply ORDER BY tests_apply_no DESC, tests_date DESC) tr RIGHT OUTER JOIN members m ON m.members_no = tr.members_no WHERE m.members_no = #{membersNo} AND rownum <= 1
